amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce and then increase funding for DOE nuclear energy activities by $20 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $20 million in funding within the Nuclear Energy account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 269 (Roll no. 510).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Stearns.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 269 (Roll no. 510).
